text: @KellyO @VP @VP, the hard truth is that we aren't safe in Trump's "America". Wildly escalating COVID19 infections/deaths, Russia having our soldiers killed with Trump's permission, millions losing health insurance, anonymous Federal agents taking over our cities. Trump & @VP are killing us.
